alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 7:40PM EDT until July 11 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Williams River At Rockingham. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Monday the stage was 15.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.8 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.9 feet on 08/28/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Williams River Rockingham Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 6 pm: 15.6 Forecast: Mon 8 pm 18.4 Tue 2 am 17.1 Tue 8 am 11.2 Tue 2 pm 7.8 Tue 8 pm 6.2 Wed 2 am 5.2 &&
